text: <@U26AKMZ19> Yes, I can also confirm that. I have the same issue. Custom modules with styles tab with any group that contains a group inside are visible in the page editor but not in the module preview.
Creating a dynamic page template in a Child theme via HTML/HUBL. I want to pull in a module from the Parent theme. How do I reference the path to that module?

`{% dnd_module "multi_col_content_1"`
        `path='../modules/desired-module.html',`
        `label="Multi-Column Content",`
        `offset=0`
      `%}`
Doing something like this in the Child Theme template page I'm creating throws this error: `custom widget definition not found`
Thank you both! This should also now be fixed in the design manager preview as well as the editors.
